price: Nta co Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah) ijejwe gukora, kiretse ugushikiriza gusa ubutumwa, nayo Imana Allah Irazi neza ivyo muserura mu bikorwa n’amajambo, hamwe rero n’ubugororotsi canke ubuhuvyi muhisha mu mishaha yanyu.
arabic: مَّا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُبۡدُونَ وَمَا تَكۡتُمُونَ

meta.transliteration: mā ʿalā al-rasūli illā al-balāghu wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā tub'dūna wamā taktumūna
